message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer you the product for $11000. This is a competitive price, considering the product's worth to you is $10000. I believe it's a fair starting point for our negotiation.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $10500 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer you the product for $10750. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to you and my original asking price.
Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I understand your position and appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with a price of $10600 for the product.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll offer you the product for $10550. This is as close as I'm willing to get to your desired price, considering the product's value to me.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts in negotiating. I would like to counter with a price of $10500 for the product.

Bob, I understand you're sticking to your original offer. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer you the product for $10475. This is as close as I'm willing to get to your desired price, considering the product's value to me.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your continued efforts in negotiation. I would like to counter with a price of $10450 for the product.
Bob, I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I'll offer you the product for $10425. This is my final concession, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to reach an agreement. I would like to counter with a price of $10400 for the product.
